title: Github handles are case sensitive
body_html:
One of our students couldn't add a coach to her team. She added the github handle in lowercase (e.g, super_coach), while in GitHub and in the Teams app DB that coach's github handle was written with uppercase letters (e.g., SuPeR_CoAcH).

As a result, the Teams app created an empty coach role in the team.
body_text:
One of our students couldn't add a coach to her team. She added the github handle in lowercase (e.g, super_coach), while in GitHub and in the Teams app DB that coach's github handle was written with uppercase letters (e.g., SuPeR_CoAcH).
As a result, the Teams app created an empty coach role in the team.
body:
One of our students couldn't add a coach to her team. She added the github handle in lowercase (e.g, `super_coach`), while in GitHub and in the Teams app DB that coach's github handle was written with uppercase letters (e.g., `SuPeR_CoAcH`).

As a result, the Teams app created an empty coach role in the team.
